about_the_game:
Play with my Balls is an exciting action-puzzle game where you shake, aim, and shoot balls into their respective holes. Engage in thrilling challenges by destroying enemy balls and collecting coins along the way. Master the art of precision to sink all the balls accurately and dominate the ball kingdom. Conquer various locations and make them shine brightly under your stars as you strive to become the ultimate ruler of the ball realm.



Key Features:
  • Challenging Gameplay: Combine action and puzzle-solving to sink balls into holes.
  • Enemy Balls: Destroy opponent balls to clear your path.
  • Coin Collection: Gather coins to boost your score and unlock new levels.
  • Precision Shooting: Master the skills to accurately sink all balls.
  • Kingdom Conquest: Rule over various locations and make them shine under your command.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Play with my Balls - Action-puzzle game about shaking balls, destroying opponents, and perfectly sinking them into holes. Collect coins and eliminate enemy balls to become the king of the ball kingdom across all locations.
